attributes.action: uk family ,one being  an OAP sleeping in a car for 15month ,in freezing weather
attributes.background: this is truly shocking , old lady sleeping homeless in a car with her daughter for the past 15 months ,sometimes tempretures dropping to below ZERO , our jails are full of folk we gave houses to and failed to coexist in our society , why are these uk citizens being treated this way ,

rejection.details: It's not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. Homelessness and housing are usually the responsibility of local councils. You could contact your local council to seek help and support for this family.
